Notes

Elaborate die-cut cover with 'twin' colour inner sleeves. Recorded in every corner of Los Angeles and some rooms in New York. "Hanging Gardens" uses an altered version of the lead melody of "Seven Wonders" by Fleetwood Mac "Holding On" features a sample of "Escape" by The Deeper Band, courtesy of Paterson International Records (Vern Hill/CRUMP MUSIC PUBLISHING). "Long Lost" (featuring Active Child, courtesy of Vagrant Records.) Tracks sequentially numbered on release, regardless of sides.
